name: Huggy Adventure Master 3D
description:
The brand new adventure game is here now! Huggy is a robot now!

Are you ready for adventure with huggy?
-Help the hero to finish the level.
-The 10+ levels are made for you
-Jump for escape form obstacles
-Attack the enemmies!
-Collect the points
-The game will be harder , it wont be easy!
-Huggy will be happy if you are help him!
